attributes.action: Stop the beagle puppy farm in hull for lab testing
attributes.background: These beautiful and loving animals will never know love compassion, just pain, suffering and neglect! It's WRONG and CRUEL!!!!

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104454

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
